channel.title: Shield of Arrav (Black Arm gang)
channel.description:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- --------------------Quest ID(13)Shield of Arrav(Black arm Gang)------------------------ --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Quest Start for becoming blackarm gang: Tramp
Npc IDS: ID: 24 Man- coords: 111,3367 ID: 42 king- coords: 126,474 ID: 39 Curator- coords: 101,488 ID: 28 Tramp- coords 132, 527 ID: 27 Katrine- coords: 149,534 ID: 37 Weaponsmaster- coords: ID: 64 Thief- coords: 149,529 (3 in blackarm building)
ITEM IDS: ID: 48 key (phoenix gang key, given to you by a player) ID: 59 phoenix crossbow ID: 53 broken shield ID: 54 broken shield ID: 61 certificate
OBJECT IDS: ID: 85 cupboard- coords: 145,1477 ID: 20 door - coords: 103,532
Missing objects BlackArm gang: ID: 19 door- coords: 148,532 ID: 42 Stairs- coords: 146,530 (Stairs teleport you to coords: 146, 1472)
Reward: 600 gp and 1 quest point
Quest notes: (can only claim 1 certificate), player has to start quest and become a member of 1 gang in order to complete quest a player cannot simply just be given a certificate and complete quest...
Npc Quest Stages:
Tramp: 1)Talking to tramp if you want to become blackarm member--------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/Y457Zk5t 2)Talking to tramp if your already a blackarm member--------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/uzBSFrnH
Attempting to open blackarm door before getting the crossbows:------------------------------------------ SendMessage("The door is securely locked");
Katrine: 1)Stage 0-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/ELaxhLX9 2)retalking to katrine after accepting the task--------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/ACXjKiz8 3)Talking to Katrine after you obtain 2 crossbows:---------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/QXyN1bUj 4)Talking to Katrine after becoming a member-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/jkdamjRn
Attempting to take phoenix crossbow in phoenix gang weapons house: (if your a blackarm member)....... Weaponsmaster: NpcTalk("Hey thief!"); ----------npc attacks you-----------
searching cupboard upstairs in blackarm base:------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/t4RFpJnZ
Attempting to open door or talk to man in phoenix gang base------------------------------------------------- NpcTalk("Hey get away from there"); NpcTalk("Black arm dog"); -------------npc attacks you------------------
Attempting to open blackarm door after u become a blackarm member:----------------------------------SendMessage("You hear the doors being unbarred"); SendMessage("You go through the door"); king: 1)before you start quest------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/qHY79Ghx 2)if u have both halves of shield--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/CpSD6bVe 3)returning to king if you have certificates in inventory (can only claim 1 certificate)------------------------ http://pastebin.com/BnBHPFbY 4)Attempting to give certificate to king without starting quest------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/qHY79Ghx 5)after you complete quest--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/qHY79Ghx
Curator: 1)before you start quest------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/ux6viWnz 2)if you have both halves of shield in inventory-------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/b6dwTJqr 3)after you complete quest--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/ux6viWnz

item.title: Shield of Arrav (Black Arm gang)
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

--------------------Quest ID(13)Shield of Arrav(Black arm Gang)------------------------

Quest Start for becoming blackarm gang: Tramp

Npc IDS:
ID: 24 Man- coords: 111,3367
ID: 42 king- coords: 126,474
ID: 39 Curator- coords: 101,488
ID: 28 Tramp- coords 132, 527
ID: 27 Katrine- coords: 149,534
ID: 37 Weaponsmaster- coords:
ID: 64 Thief- coords: 149,529 (3 in blackarm building)

ITEM IDS:
ID: 48 key (phoenix gang key, given to you by a player)
ID: 59 phoenix crossbow
ID: 53 broken shield
ID: 54 broken shield
ID: 61 certificate

OBJECT IDS:
ID: 85 cupboard- coords: 145,1477
ID: 20 door - coords: 103,532

Missing objects BlackArm gang:
ID: 19 door- coords: 148,532
ID: 42 Stairs- coords: 146,530 (Stairs teleport you to coords: 146, 1472)

Reward: 600 gp and 1 quest point

Quest notes: (can only claim 1 certificate), player has to start quest and become a member of 1 gang in order to complete quest a player cannot simply just be given a certificate and complete quest…

Npc Quest Stages:

Tramp:
1)Talking to tramp if you want to become blackarm member--------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/Y457Zk5t
2)Talking to tramp if your already a blackarm member--------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/uzBSFrnH

Attempting to open blackarm door before getting the crossbows:------------------------------------------ SendMessage(“The door is securely locked”);

Katrine:
1)Stage 0-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/ELaxhLX9
2)retalking to katrine after accepting the task--------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/ACXjKiz8
3)Talking to Katrine after you obtain 2 crossbows:---------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/QXyN1bUj
4)Talking to Katrine after becoming a member-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/jkdamjRn

Attempting to take phoenix crossbow in phoenix gang weapons house: (if your a blackarm member)… Weaponsmaster: NpcTalk(“Hey thief!”);
----------npc attacks you-----------

searching cupboard upstairs in blackarm base:------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/t4RFpJnZ

Attempting to open door or talk to man in phoenix gang base------------------------------------------------- NpcTalk(“Hey get away from there”);
NpcTalk(“Black arm dog”);
-------------npc attacks you------------------

Attempting to open blackarm door after u become a blackarm member:----------------------------------SendMessage(“You hear the doors being unbarred”);
SendMessage(“You go through the door”);
king:
1)before you start quest------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/qHY79Ghx
2)if u have both halves of shield--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/CpSD6bVe
3)returning to king if you have certificates in inventory (can only claim 1 certificate)------------------------ http://pastebin.com/BnBHPFbY
4)Attempting to give certificate to king without starting quest------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/qHY79Ghx
5)after you complete quest--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/qHY79Ghx

Curator:
1)before you start quest------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ http://pastebin.com/ux6viWnz
2)if you have both halves of shield in inventory-------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/b6dwTJqr
3)after you complete quest--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- http://pastebin.com/ux6viWnz
